title: NHS R&D Lab: Grip Tape
description: The fourth installment of the NHS R&D Lab videos showcases the machinery and techniques used to test skateboard grip tape; specifically, Durability, and Grip Tape adhesive testing. As always, the information gathered from both man and machine is used to evaluate the competition and new grip tape manufacturing technologies.
